body_html:
Cudnn RNN ops were added here: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/cudnn_rnn

Closing this bug since that's probably the major thing desired from cudnn v5.

And I'm sure v6 is around the corner...

body:
Cudnn RNN ops were added here: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/cudnn_rnn

Closing this bug since that's probably the major thing desired from cudnn v5.

And I'm sure v6 is around the corner...
